title: VerificationResult
description: Result returned by the SDK verifyProof() and verifySignedProof() methods. Also the response body for POST /api/verify-age and POST /api/verify-nationality.

verified.description: Whether the proof was successfully verified

claimType.description: Type of claim that was verified

minAge.description: Minimum age threshold (present for age claims)

error.description: Error message when verified is false
